DOC.brief_summary: There currently sufficient evidence superiority one two available type ( onlay type , inlay type ) patellofemoral arthroplasty . Therefore , aim study compare two type prospective comparative setting . Patients wait list patellofemoral arthroplasty randomize either onlay inlay type patellofemoral arthroplasty . The KOOS - knee score serf primary outcome parameter . Secondary outcome parameter Marx Activity Scale , HSS patella score , Kujala Score , radiographic loosening , progression tibiofemoral degeneration , revision surgery parameter patellofemoral track . Inferential statistic perform 1-year follow data-sets .
DOC.criteria: patellofemoral osteoarthritis , wait list patellofemoral arthroplasty systemic inflammatory arthropathy tibiofemoral joint degeneration IKDC grade C bad severe degeneration also trochlea margin ( inlay PFA adequate ) patellectomy previous implantation tibiofemoral metal implant extension loss > 5 degree knee flexion le 100Â° plan concomitant tibiofemoral procedure ( eg . coronal plane osteotomy , tibiofemoral cartilage procedure , tibiofemoral ligament procedure )
